description: Igatpuri is a charming hill station nestled in the Western Ghats of Maharashtra, India. Known for its lush greenery, cascading waterfalls, and mist-covered hills, Igatpuri offers a refreshing escape from the chaos of city life. Alongside the natural beauty, Igatpuri also boasts luxurious villas that provide a serene and indulgent retreat. These villas offer spacious accommodations, modern amenities, and stunning views of the surrounding landscape.
name: Igatpuri
